alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 09 at 7:05PM MDT until April 12 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 253 AND 254...... Winds have lightened and RH is rising, the RFW will be allowed to expire. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 253 AND 254... * Affected Area...In Colorado...Fire Weather Zone 253 Kit Carson and Fire Weather Zone 254 Cheyenne. * Timing...From noon MDT through 7 PM MDT Tuesday. * Winds...Southwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph Tuesday. * Relative Humidity...As low as 14 percent Tuesday. * Temperatures...70 to 80 Tuesday. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: Avoid creating sparks. Take notice of any local burn bans.
